title: League not going to NZ Armageddon FeelsBadMan
body: Wondering why league arent going to armageddon kinda feelsbadman since last time we got free skins and watch bronze plebs get stomped by challenjours would be cool to see if they could still go, even though its nz doesnt mean league have to skip it riperinos

replies.body:
They have the friends of the rift even at Saturday. 6pm - 10pm $10 entry.

Everyone goes out with something in hand ;)

Nothing on the friday (that i'm aware of). 

However there is

* [friends of the rift](https://www.facebook.com/events/157777944630919/) on saturday with a $10 entry fee but like iakeno said, everybody leaves with something. Tonnes of cool activities for any type of league player. 

* [rivals of the rift](https://www.facebook.com/events/1101715503242561/) on sunday. Another $10 entry fee, some more giveaways and you get to watch two teams battle it out on stage :)
Yaia, I just wanna ask if you need armageddon tickets to be eligible for the friends of the rift
